PositiveSyntaxTest.purpose: Test that safe formulas are accepted.
PositiveSyntaxTest.description: The variable <tt>?x</tt> is unbound, but <tt>(u,b)</tt> is a valid binding pattern for <tt>pred:iri-string</tt>.

InputDocument.Presentation: Document( Prefix(ex <http://example.org/example#>) Prefix(pred <http://www.w3.org/2007/rif-builtin-predicate#>) Group( Forall ?x ?z (ex:p(?x) :- And( ex:q(?z) External(pred:iri-string(?x ?z)))) ) )
